description:
A new recruit in the Inquisition notices that Captain Dragunov`s attitude seems quite careless, and he can`t understand why his men have such faith in him. He joined the Inquisition hoping to fight dangerous sorcerers, not handle odd jobs. Dragunov then receives an urgent request for aid from Captain Edmund, whose ship was attacked by a Nemesis, and they rush to help. The rookie is instantly impressed by the great number of sorcerers Edmund has captured, but Dragunov then notices something...
Source: crunchyroll
